definitions.definition: (notcomp) Of or belonging to the species Homo sapiens or its closest relatives.
Having the nature or attributes of a human being.
definitions.example: To err is human; to forgive, divine.

definitions.definition: Having or showing concern for the pain or suffering of another; compassionate.
definitions.example: As methods of execution go, beheading is more humane than drawing and quartering.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to branches of learning concerned with human affairs or the humanities, especially classical literature or rhetoric.
